Feature selection

Source: R/model-feature-selection.R
featsel_stepforward.Rd

Feature selection

Usage

featsel_stepforward(model, ...)

Arguments

model

model

...

Additional argumentos for stats::step

Examples


data("credit_woe")

m <- glm(bad ~ ., family = binomial, data = credit_woe)

featsel_stepforward(m)
#> Start:  AIC=49385.21
